original_text:
Delilah then said to Samson, “All this time you have been making a fool of me and lying to me. Tell me how you can be tied.”
He replied, “If you weave the seven braids of my head into the fabric on the loom and tighten it with the pin, I’ll become as weak as any other man.” So while he was sleeping, Delilah took the seven braids of his head, wove them into the fabric
korean_text: 들릴라가 삼손에게 이르되 당신이 이 때까지 나를 희롱하여 내게 거짓말을 하였도다 내가 무엇으로 당신을 결박할 수 있을는지 내게 말하라 하니 삼손이 그에게 이르되 그대가 만일 나의 머리털 일곱 가닥을 베틀의 날실에 섞어 짜면 되리라 하는지라

sentences.original_text: All this time you have been making a fool of me
sentences.korean_translation: 이 시간 동안 당신은 나를 속여왔습니다

sentences.original_text: Tell me how you can be tied
sentences.korean_translation: 당신을 어떻게 묶을 수 있는지 말해주세요

sentences.original_text: If you weave the seven braids of my head
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 내 머리의 일곱 가닥 머리카락을 엮으면

sentences.original_text: into the fabric on the loom
and tighten it with the pin
I'll become as weak as any other man
Delilah took the seven braids of his head
sentences.korean_translation: 들릴라가 그의 머리에서 일곱 가닥 머리카락을 가져왔다
